originalText.text:
My wife and I didn't file taxes for over 3 years. Not only did Jon Girodes of Girodes INC have our penalties removed but we received a refund.

I like that we could call or text his firm 24/7..

We had this worry on our minds which he removed. Thank you.

originalText.text: I paid Jon Girodes of "Girodes Inc" for a tax service he failed to provide. He acknowledged his total failure several times via emails and text messages and agreed to refund me. Then he disappears. It's now been several months and he has made no attempt at resolution. My attorney looked into him, and he is not a registered CPA or accountant in any state as on 12/18/15.

text.text: I paid Jon Girodes of "Girodes Inc" for a tax service he failed to provide. He acknowledged his total failure several times via emails and text messages and agreed to refund me. originalText.text: The worst business experience I have ever had. Jon Girodes actually collected money for services that I would later find out he had no intention of completing. Instead of handling any issue, or refund, he literally wouldn't answer a single call, email, or text. I have dealt with the silent treatment in children, this was my first adult experience. It seems the other Google reviewer ran into a similar issue.

originalText.text:
Allow me to address the 3 poor reviews out of the 37,249 clients I have. The newest is from a young lady who I've never conducted business with. I allowed her to stay in my residence and she stole many items and was asked to leave. Her family suggested that all minorities should go back to being slaves. Her father, Sam Silverman operates a store in Massachusetts and uses the "N" word very often. Don't take my word for it.... It will be on youtube soon.

Jason's coplaint was a bit embarassing. He offered "favors" as compensation. When I poliely refused the remarks went on Google.

Last, this fellow actually complained because I was able to provide a bigger refund. He thought it was unfair to the IRS.

You do the math! :-)

originalText.text: Fast service. I received more of a refund then using Turbo Tax like I did in the past. My lien and wage garnishment was removed quickly. Im a fan for life. Thank you.
